tool_description: Aggregates analysis results across multiple review analysis components, computing summary statistics, distributions, and consolidated metrics for comprehensive reporting.

sentiment_labels.description: Array of sentiment classifications for reviews

ratings.description: Array of numerical ratings if available

themes.description: Array of theme assignments for reviews

timestamps.description: Array of review timestamps for temporal analysis

group_by_time.description: Time grouping for temporal analysis: day, week, month, or year

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: sentiment_labels and sentiment_scores must have the same length.
Empty required arrays: Provide at least one sentiment label and score.
Invalid time grouping: Use day, week, month, or year for group_by_time.
Invalid timestamp format: Timestamps must be in ISO 8601 format.
Aggregation failed: Unable to compute aggregated statistics with provided data.
usage: Provide sentiment analysis results and optionally include ratings, themes, and timestamps for comprehensive aggregation and statistical analysis.

sentiment_distribution.description: Array of sentiment counts in format 'sentiment:count'

rating_statistics.description: Rating statistics summary if ratings provided

theme_distribution.description: Array of theme counts in format 'theme:count'

temporal_trends.description: Array of temporal sentiment trends if timestamps provided

key_insights.description: Array of key statistical insights from aggregation

aggregation_summary.description: Comprehensive summary of aggregated review analysis results
